Articles.Content:
KSP: 0.90 [beta] Mac 32bit

Problem: The shadows are extremely glitchy and don't show up correctly. Lights also shine through parts.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Mods Installed:

ActiveTextureManagement

AerojetKerbodyne

AnimatedDecouplers

Firespitter

JoolianDiscovery

KAX

Kerbaltek

Lionhead_Aerospace_Inc

MechJeb2

MechJeb2 Embedded by Dennis6492

Modulefixer.dll

ModuleManager.2.5.6.dll

ModuleManager.ConfigCache

ModuleManager.ConfigSHA

NearFutureSolar

ProceduralDynamics

ProceduralFairings

RealChute

SDHI

SmokeScreen

TweakScale

Virgin Kalactic

ZZZ_Flags

Reproduction Steps:

Install all the mods shown above, and watch in horror as your shadows glitch out.

Log:

player.log
